room_title: Escape room "The Inheritance" by Mysterium Escape Adventure in Boone
room_description: Dear old Uncle Ambrose, the most accomplished explorer and adventurer of our time, has sadly passed on. Fortunately for you and the rest of his nieces and nephews, his incredible and limitless fortune has been left behind. But getting your hands on his money will not be easy! Can you outwit the most interesting man in the world and take home his incredible fortune?
